text: Freddy Figueroa (born November 26, 1994) is an Ecuadorian judoka. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's +100 kg event, in which he was eliminated in the first round by Kim Sung-min. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Ecuador Category:Judoka at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in judo Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Ecuador Category:Judoka at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Judoka at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:South American Games gold medalists for Ecuador Category:South American Games medalists in judo Category:Competitors at the 2018 South American Games
title: Freddy Figueroa
